text:
We use LinkedIn a bunch. I think LinkedIn ads are a key channel if you have a niche B2B product and you’re aiming mid-market-enterprise, as it allows really granular job title / industry targeting.

However, LinkedIn can be pretty spendy if you push the wrong content. From our experience, content with a  strong POV and argument gets the most engagement (which drives down CPC hugely), and I tend to write stuff specifically for that purpose. Like <https://shorthand.com/the-craft/the-pdf-is-in-terminal-decline/index.html|this> or <https://shorthand.com/the-craft/most-academic-research-has-no-impact/index.html|this>.
